blogPost.excerpt: Steady Capital is a web dashboard for retail investors to buy shares of income-generating commercial real estate. Make investments and see financial reports in our dashboard, and get monthly deposits from your investments directly to your bank account.
blogPost.body: Steady Capital is a web dashboard for retail investors to buy shares of income-generating commercial real estate. Make investments and see financial reports in our dashboard, and get monthly deposits from your investments directly to your bank account.
blogPost.title: Steady Capital - Passive income-generating commercial real estate for $100
blogPost.author: Dillon Zhang Forrest

localize.description: 稳健资本是一个网络仪表盘，供散户购买创收商业地产的股票。在我们的仪表盘上进行投资和查看财务报告，并从您的投资中直接获得每月存款到您的银行账户。
localize.tagline: 100美元的被动创收型商业地产。

localize.description: 穩健資本是一個網絡儀表盤，供散戶購買創收商業地產的股票。在我們的儀表盤上進行投資和查看財務報告，並從您的投資中直接獲得每月存款到您的銀行賬戶。
localize.tagline: 100美元的被動創收型商業地產。

previous.excerpt: Navigating the Suez Canal is a high-stress, complicated feat that requires master piloting skills. Try your hand at traversing one of the most highly trafficked nautical thoroughfares in the world.
previous.title: Steer through the Suez Canal - Navigate through the Suez Canal and master piloting skills

localize.description: 航行苏伊士运河是一项高压力、复杂的壮举，需要掌握驾驶技术。试着穿越世界上人流量最大的航海大道之一。
localize.tagline: 畅游苏伊士运河，掌握驾驶技巧。

localize.description: 航行蘇伊士運河是一項高壓力、複雜的壯舉，需要掌握駕駛技術。試着穿越世界上人流量最大的航海大道之一。
localize.tagline: 暢遊蘇伊士運河，掌握駕駛技巧。

next.excerpt: Our new Slack App: Bring Process Street into Slack to manage and automate all your workflows in one place. Handle tasks, forms and approvals in a few taps, without needing to leave Slack. Process Street makes your team's recurring work fun, fast and faultless.
next.title: Process Street’s Slack App - Manage and automate your recurring work in a single place

localize.description: 我们的新 Slack App。将Process Street引入Slack，在一个地方管理和自动化您的所有工作流程。只需轻点几下即可处理任务、表格和审批，无需离开Slack。流程街让您团队的经常性工作变得有趣、快速和无懈可击。
localize.tagline: 在一个地方管理和自动化您的重复性工作。

localize.description: 我們的新 Slack App。將Process Street引入Slack，在一個地方管理和自動化您的所有工作流程。只需輕點幾下即可處理任務、表格和審批，無需離開Slack。流程街讓您團隊的經常性工作變得有趣、快速和無懈可擊。
localize.tagline: 在一個地方管理和自動化您的重複性工作。
